gmi
Class GroupProxy

java.lang.Object
  gmi.GroupProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
spread.AdvancedMessageListener
public class GroupProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements spread.AdvancedMessageListener

GroupProxy Object implements the AdvancedMessageListener interface provided by Spread java API to receive the message, it differentiate received message depending upon it's type which is either membership or regular and depending upon it's type it called corresponding method to handle it. it never received the membership message because when we make connection to spread daemon we specify that this connection will not receive membership messages. This Object communicate with spread daemon for delivering of message to target.

Author:
Gurvinder Singh
See Also:
Copyright (c) 1993-2006 Spread Concepts LLC. All rights reserved.

regularMessageReceived

public void regularMessageReceived(spread.SpreadMessage msg)
This method is called by spread when it receive the regular message and deliver the message to GroupProxy object. Upon receiving message it checks the methodSignature and according to that it takes action

Specified by:
regularMessageReceived in interface spread.AdvancedMessageListener
Parameters:
msg - Spread Message received from sender

sendMessagetoServer

public void sendMessagetoServer(java.lang.String receiver,
                                Message obj)
This method sends the anycast message to receiver which is one of the member of servergroup. it sets the message number for acknowledgement.

updateView

public void updateView()
updateView() creates a message to send to group to get all the running servers in the servergroup to get the service.

public void getUpdateView(Message msg)
this method multicast the message to get the update view of all the running servers at that time.

setserverStub

public void setserverStub(java.lang.Object proxy)
This method is called by regularMessageReceived() when it receive the message with signature "getServerStub" which contains the class name array of interfaces which implement the ExternalGMIListener interface. it creates the server stub based on the class names it received from server.

Parameters:
proxy -

getServer

public java.lang.Object getServer()
getServer() is called by client application to get the server stub to get the service required by client application.

Returns:
server stub Object

timeOut

public void timeOut(java.lang.String sender,
                    java.lang.Object obj)
This is called by TimeOut Object when it doesn't receive the acknowledgement for the message sent with in the specified time limit which is set to 1 sec. it removes the particular server on which it has time out and try tp send the message again to next server from the list and if list is empty it try to get new list of all the running servers.

Parameters:
sender - for whom time out occurs.
obj - message which is sent to the server.

groupTimeOut

public void groupTimeOut()
This is called by TimeOut Object when it doesn't receive the acknowledgement for the message sent with in the specified time limit which is set to 1 sec. it try to get the updateView again and if it didn't receive the acknowledgment again then it prints message and exit.

public void resultTimeout(java.lang.Object obj)
